just make it so it only teleports you to one place.

case 2467: if (playerRights >= 1) { triggerTele(3078, 9886); sM("You teleport to the Staff Zone!"); } else { sM("You cannot use this portal! It is only for staff, work and you may get!"); } break;

item.title: Height problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Ok this is a delta version… the X and y cords are in the place where you can cath hell rats… but if i tele to it im above the place…
how can i fix this i have already tried; height = -1;
But yeah… that didn’t work i havent much experience in delta…

[code] case 2467:
if (playerRights >= 1) {
triggerTele(3078+misc.random(1),

9886+misc.random(1),1);
sM(“You teleport to the Staff Zone!”);
} else {
sM("You cannot use this portal! It is only for

staff, work and you may get!");
}
break;
[/code]

Read full topic
